title: BlockchainBridgeWay – Web3 Agency Website
description: Developed the frontend of a responsive React website for a Web3 agency showcasing services like strategy, branding, and community management.
impact: Delivered a polished, accessible UI that improved agency visibility in the DeFi and NFT space.

title: BioKinetica – Microbial Kinetics Analysis
description: Analyzed fermentation data using biokinetic models and visualized microbial growth, bioflocculant production, and substrate usage.
impact: Enabled optimization of fermentation processes and improved substrate efficiency.

title: CatalystInsights – Catalysis Data Analysis
description: Processed catalysis experiment data to evaluate catalyst performance and emissions reduction with advanced visualizations.
impact: Provided actionable insights for catalyst selection and process design improvements.

title: Employee Attrition Analysis – HR Analytics
description: Analyzed HR datasets to identify attrition drivers and offered actionable strategies with visual reports and presentation slides.
impact: Revealed key turnover patterns and recommended HR policy improvements.

title: Formatio – File Conversion Web App
description: Built a Django-based web app that converts files across formats like Excel, JSON, XML, PDF, and CSV.
impact: Offered fast, browser-based file conversion without third-party tools.

title: Image Classifier – ML-Based Image Prediction App
description: Developed a machine learning-powered web app using TensorFlow and Django to classify images based on pre-trained models.
impact: Enabled users to upload images and receive real-time predictions, demonstrating ML model deployment in a web interface.

title: CTR/STR Reports – Regulatory Reporting System
description: Created an XML-based reporting system for compliance teams to automatically generate CTR and STR reports based on transaction triggers.
impact: Simplified compliance reporting workflows and improved scalability across platforms.

title: RadarPro – Compliance Screening Tool (LLM-Enhanced)
description: Built backend features for a compliance tool that analyzes transaction data and automates reporting workflows for financial institutions.
impact: Reduced report generation time by 50% while supporting cross-database deployments.

title: DataForge – Synthetic Data Generator Web App
description: Built a Django app that allows users to generate customizable synthetic datasets in multiple formats for testing and prototyping.
impact: Streamlined test data generation for developers and QA teams.

title: E-Commerce Backend with Stripe API
description: Created a Node.js backend with product endpoints, JWT-based authentication, and Stripe-powered payment integration.
impact: Enabled secure, real-world payment flows for e-commerce applications.

title: URL Shortener API with TypeScript
description: Developed a backend API using Node.js and TypeScript for shortening and redirecting URLs, with validation and tracking features.
impact: Enabled efficient link shortening and redirection for web applications.
